thread.title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Jingsheng Mechanical & Electrical Signs Contracts Worth 858.24 Mln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Jingsheng Mechanical & Electrical Signs Contracts Worth 858.24 Mln Yuan

organizations.name: brief-zhejiang jingsheng mechanical & electrical signs contracts worth
reuters) - zhejiang jingsheng mechanical & electrical co ltd

text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Zhejiang Jingsheng Mechanical & Electrical Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT SIGNS CONTRACTS WORTH A COMBINED 858.24 MILLION YUAN ($135.33 million) WITH INNER MONGOLIA SOLAR FIRM Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2I5uNqv Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3418 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
